mapper.select: SELECT max(apply_date) as max,min(apply_date) as min from doctor_warehouse_material_apply;

SELECT ifnull(max(CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS farrowSowFeedAmount, ifnull(max(CASE WHEN type = 1 THEN quantity ELSE 0 END), 0) AS farrowSowFeedCount, ifnull(max(CASE WHEN type = 2 THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS farrowSowMaterialAmount, ifnull(max(CASE WHEN type = 2 THEN quantity ELSE 0 END), 0) AS farrowSowMaterialCount, ifnull(max(CASE WHEN type = 3 THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS farrowSowVaccineAmount, ifnull(max(CASE WHEN type = 4 THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS farrowSowDrugAmount, ifnull(max(CASE WHEN type = 5 THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS farrowSowConsumerAmount
FROM ( SELECT sum(quantity) AS quantity,sum(quantity * unit_price) AS amount,type FROM doctor_warehouse_material_apply WHERE apply_type=2 AND farm_id in
#{id}
AND apply_date >= #{startAt} AND apply_date <= #{endAt} GROUP BY type ) AS a
SELECT farm_id FROM doctor_warehouse_material_apply WHERE apply_date >= #{startAt} AND apply_date <= #{endAt} group by farm_id

SELECT t0.id,t0.name,t1.quantity,t1.amount,t1.pig_type,t1.type,t1.date FROM doctor_orgs t0 LEFT JOIN (SELECT org_id,pig_type,type,sum(quantity) as quantity,sum(quantity*unit_price) as amount, apply_date as date from doctor_warehouse_material_apply WHERE apply_type=0 and pig_type!=7 GROUP BY org_id,pig_type,type,
apply_date
date_format(apply_date,'%x-%v')
date_format(apply_date,'%y-%m')
concat(date_format(apply_date, '%y-'), QUARTER(apply_date))
date_format(apply_date,'%y')
) t1 ON t0.id=t1.org_id;

select ifnull(sum(quantity), 0) from doctor_groups a left join `doctor_warehouse_material_apply` b on a.id = b.pig_group_id where a.status = -1 and b.type = 1 AND a.org_id = #{orzId} AND a.farm_id = #{orzId} AND date_format(a.close_at, '%y-%m-%d') = date_format(#{sumAt}, '%y-%m-%d') AND date_format(a.close_at, '%x-%v') = date_format(#{sumAt}, '%x-%v') AND date_format(a.close_at, '%y-%m') = date_format(#{sumAt}, '%y-%m') AND concat(date_format(a.close_at, '%y-'), QUARTER(a.close_at)) = concat(date_format(#{sumAt}, '%y-'), QUARTER(#{sumAt}))
AND date_format(a.close_at, '%y') = date_format(#{sumAt}, '%y') AND a.pig_type = #{pigType}
